turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Get them in the lab!

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: Not so fast Yllo! There's a protocol here.

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: My god! This is way over your head, pal. We need to call some experts and . . .

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: I am an expert!

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: You're a teacher.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Brodski I'll talk slow so you can understand me. She's thawing. If we don't get her to the lab, she'll die, and that will be on your bald fucking head!

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: What if they're carrying? Did you even check?

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: How do you know that piece of cursed rock down there doesn't carry something metal tits can't detect?

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Well, when we rejuvenate this one you can ask her.

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: Damnit, Yllo! I don't like it.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: I don't give a shit. This one's prime for decryonization. We're brining her back.

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: I still think we should send for a team of real scientists.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: I am a scientist you asshole! This could be the most important discovery in 400 years. Do you have any idea what a find like this could mean?

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: Right now, I care only for the safety of this crew. You don't know anything about these two -

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: Jesus what the hell is that?

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: That's exactly what we need to find out. Check your orders, Sergeant. I out rank you where discovery is concerned. Now step aside. I have a medical emergency to deal with.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: What the hell are you doing?

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: My job.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Fine, just stay out of my way.  Hit it.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Wait a minute...I need...

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: Give it a rest Yllo. She needs some time.

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: Yllo, what's your head count?

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Looks like we're missing two. Stone and Kkinsa.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: ALL I'm saying is dock with Space Lab, couple of hours no more. Let them take a look at our friends.

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: Not a chance.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: JUst don't go in there half cocked. You guys have a tendency to blow shit up and ask questions later.

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: You got that right.

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: Got it! Let's move out girls. Yllo go to Lab two and cover out backs.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: At least try to get him alive...will ya Brodski?

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Yeah, I got ya. I don't see anything inside though.

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: You just keep an eye out.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Yeah yeah. Got it.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Ok Sarge, what's your status?

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: wHAT'S My status?! I've lost three men and your worthless fuck! After I kill this asshole I'm coming your Yllo!

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: But I didn't see...

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Sergeant!

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: I'm with you kid.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Where is he?

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: Lab two, relax. What's the matter? He's dead.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: No, you're dead! You're all dead!

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: He's dead. They're both dead. You don't understand what is on this ship. This is a being that kills. That's what he does. That's all he does. And he is very good at it.

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: Kicker, Sven. Get into the grid and tell me what the hell is going on!

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: I doubt that. I think we can handle whatever your ancient hockey player can throw at us.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Look! Just get everyone together, get off the ship... and then blow it to kingdom fucking come! That's the only way you're going to live.

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: I need to know what you know about this guy.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Don't go out there. You can't win. We need to get off this ship. That's all there is to it.

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: Not an option. I'm going to hunt this son of a bitch down.

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: We need weapons.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Weapons? All this technology and what good has it done?!

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: Jesus, God!

turns.speaker: KICKER
turns.text: Oh man, what the hell happened?

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: Report to weapons. We're going on a hunt.

turns.speaker: KICKER
turns.text: Roger that.  Time to kick some ass!

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: You sumbitch! Three dead! On my watch! If that...that thing is out there, it's dead! You got it!!!

turns.speaker: KICKER
turns.text: Fuckin A...

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: Now get out of our way...get back to the lab and baby sit your snot nosed brats... we've got a job to do!

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: Kicker, anything?

turns.speaker: KICKER
turns.text: Negative.

turns.speaker: KICKER
turns.text: Jesus, Sarge, what is this thing?

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: Teach! Where the hell are you?! Where's our visuals?!!

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: Where is everybody? What happened?

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: Damnit! You scared the hell out of me!

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: Give me a break! What happened?

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: Jason. He's what happened. Then Grendel hit Space Lab.

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: Space Lab?! Wait'll I get my hands on Yllo.

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: Yllo's dead. We...we thought you were too.

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: Takes more than a steelbalde to take this old dog down.

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: Pull me in!

turns.speaker: BRODSKI
turns.text: I'm pulling, damnit!

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Where are you going?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: We have to get off this ship.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: You just need to relax. Rizzo ti's the future. We have soldiers on board, E-X Grunts, the baddest of the bad...and their weapons? I'm sure are slightly more advanced than what you're used to.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: I hope so.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Outta here?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Isn't there an escape POD on this ship? Something?

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Rizzo, he's out there.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Yeah and he'll be here soon enough.  Last chance.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Well, I'm not hanging out here with Ms. Showtunes.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Guys!!! The shuttle?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Don't just stand there! Shoot him!

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: No you don't!

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Kkinsa, open the goddamn door!

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Yeah, that's it, scare the hell out of here, that'll work.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Kkinsa, Crutch is hurt! We need access to the shuttle's med-kit or he'll die.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Med-kit?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: I guessed.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: We're screwed!

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: 400 years in the future and these pea-shooters are the best you can do?!

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: What if you miss?

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: What if we don't?

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Rizzo?!

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: It's better this way. If we were rescued Jason would just get off the ship. You want him on your precious Earth II?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Hey.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: That's a good fantasy, though. Kinky, but good.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Hey!!

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: What's this?

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: It's the engine, reactors, audiometers, it's the stuff that makes the ship go zoom.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: That's why I'm here.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: So, you thought you'd be cool. Go against your father's wishes? Yeah, that's grown up.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: My father's company imports and exports. Archaeology is part of the business. We happen to get along just fine, smartass. Look, why don't you bust somebody else's balls for a change.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: I thought you meant...

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: You thought I meant...too tough to apologize, huh? You must have been a very lonely girl.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Jason seemed to have the right stuff. Physically, anyway. Radiation, cell damage, didn't matter. He just kept going.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Were you close to your father?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: They were all wrong. They couldn't control him.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: And what happend to ...?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: I couldn't save them.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Well, we'd be dead without you. You know that, don't you?

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: See? We're not so bad.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Not so bad.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: You know, this future shit sucks. I'll fucking do it.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: You?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Wait around on your asses all day.  I'll need a distraction.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Got it.  You ever space walked?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Oh sure, all the time.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: His mother was killed before his eyes. That's what drove him insane. It'll work.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: That sounds like Rizzo having faith in some of that future shit.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Eat me.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: You wanna release your air tanks?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Okay, good tip.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: You'll be fine.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Rizzo, you okay?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: No I'm not okay! I don't know what the hell I'm doing!

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: You're doing fine. I won't let anything happen to you, remember?

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Rizzo, did they have chinese food in your time?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: I think I had some when I was eight.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Did you like it?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: I think so, why?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Delongpre, you don't even know me.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: I know you.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Rizzo, pull away!

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: I'm stuck!

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: You okay?!

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Oh great...yeah, having a great time, and you?

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: No thank you, you crazy old woman.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Old woman?

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Well I mean, technically you are old enough to be my great, great, great...

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: I get it.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Now what?

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: We wait. I need about fifteen. Call me if there are any changes. If she farts I want a full report.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: It's time.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: What about the others? Shouldn't we wait?

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: I've waited long enough. Kay . . . you know what to do.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Spunky . . .

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: She broke my fucking nose!

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Well?

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: She needs a little time.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: More time...shit, she's had 400 years...

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: That's really funny.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: I'd want her statements before we reach porch. Jesus, women.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Yeah, like you'd be a rock after everything she went through?

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: God damnit! Will you stop doing that?!

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Oh I like her a lot.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Shut up! She just wants this thing dead!

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: No shit. I got no problem with that.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: We must assume the machete was an intricate part of the game of hockey.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: I'm thinking Rizzo was right.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Thinking with your dick again, Delongpre?

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Maybe we should go with them. Like you said, your Space Lab connections can deal with this thing. At least we'll be safe.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: They are not going anywhere. I cut power to the  shuttle.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Now hold on! We should hear her out!

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: She's obviously dealt with this guy before.

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Yuck.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: We're screwed.

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Go-go-go-go-go!!!!

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: He's right behind us!

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: I feel better. Now how do you fire this damn thing?

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Just go! I've a feeling he's right behind us!

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: It's on the table where I left it! What the hell are you doing?! Hurry up!

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: I'm on my way.

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Kaboom.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Again?! Jesus!

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Okay?!!

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Just come on, I've got an idea.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: I'll help you in.

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Kay-Em, you've saved our lives, you know that don't you?

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Oh, shit. He's going to see us.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Well, do something!

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: He's trying to ask you out on a date.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Shut up, Thorgan!

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Push off toward us.

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: Forget her, she's a pain in the ass. Let her hang there.

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: I...I don't know what I did...

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: You lost the charge?

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: He was chasing me!

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: They're not gonna make it. Close the door before he gets us all.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: They'll make it.

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: Close the fucking door!

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: NO!

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: And what's with the headgear?

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: The mask is an artifact from a sport outlawed in twenty-twelve.

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: Now that's just gross.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: GO, GO, GO!

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: Now this is getting exciting.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Remember to roll his balls around a bit.

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: You must shut down the engines.

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: Then do it. The rescue ship can find us here right?

turns.speaker: DELONGPRE
turns.text: I knew you were a little sick, but Geez.

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: I get no kick from champaign, mere alcohol doesn't faze me at all, but I get a kick out of you.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: I'm missing two!

turns.speaker: FAT LOU
turns.text: Shit! Temp's dropping! We should have left this rock an hour ago!

turns.speaker: FAT LOU
turns.text: Hey teach! This rock's starting to freeze! Get your ass back hre!

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Keep your shirt on! I'm working on it. You won't believe what we found.  Adrienne! Stoney!

turns.speaker: FAT LOU
turns.text: Oh my God . . . what the hell is . . .

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Just get us to the ship!

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Fat Lou, we're changing courses for the Solaras Space Lab.

turns.speaker: FAT LOU
turns.text: I'll need the sergeant's okay on that.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: We've got a situation here! Just do as  you're told!

turns.speaker: FAT LOU
turns.text: Alright, relax. 20 minutes. Soon as we've passed Tara's rings we'll make the course correction.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: This is what it means right here.

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: Small brains make your balls itch?

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: I'm gonna spew.

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: That ought'a help the situation.

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: You think it killed . . .  Yeah, I guess not.

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: Let's just get out of here.

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Hurry! She's lost it!

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: So what else is new?

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: You read a lot of Science Fiction didn't you?

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: A little late to be thinking about escape, isn't it?

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: YeaH, GREAT IDEA! And I'll keep the big guy distracted with a blow job.

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Would you?

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: You're so bossy.

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: You're leaving me here alone?

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: You're quicker than usual.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Later.

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: You prefer an apple?

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Jesus!

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: Oh my God! Adrienne?

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: Look ice chip, why don't you just chill out and let us handle this?

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Try to calm down. Just think, you're going to be famous!

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: What are you doing?

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Jesus! Can't you knock?  Diminish power to shutttle Beowulf.

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: What do we do?!!

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Crutch?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: I'll tell you where he is. He's walking around this ship, killing anything that moves.

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: Maybe she tripped.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Boeman don't. You know I'm right.

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: Are you crazy?! Pull the lever!

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Teleportation? Some way to beam us the hell out of dodge?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Any connection between your reality and mine is purely coincidental.

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: I'm just saying.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Come on. You got all these gadgets and shit. Why can't we get inside the right hull, seal up the doors and blow the walkways?

turns.speaker: JANESSA
turns.text: I don't know...sorry?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Sergeant, we could use a big bomb.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Robot huh?

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: Kay-em 14.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Barbie from hell...

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: Cybernetics science droid, fluent in over six...

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Yeah 3cpo, I saw STAR WARS, now how about you help me get out of this coffin, Barbie...

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: I'm afraid I cannot assist.
